attributes.action: Declare China damage the Sino-British joint declaration & restore the rule of HK
attributes.additional_details: There are 3.4 million British National living in Hong Kong. Our freedom of speech, press and election have already damaged. We demand the British government can resettle the loyalist British Hong Kong citizens to build "new Hong Kong" and British citizenship.
attributes.background: The HKSAR was totally controlled by the Communist China. HKSAR failed to protect Hong Kong Citizens interest and safety. Such as the book shop incident and the "Selection" Candidates of Legistative Council in order to avoid the voice of independent and pro-British going into the Council.
